description: [Scattered Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1015) creates inbound rules on the compromised email accounts of security personnel to automatically delete emails from vendor security products.(Citation: MSTIC Octo Tempest Operations October 2023)

external_references.description: Microsoft. (2023, October 25). Octo Tempest crosses boundaries to facilitate extortion, encryption, and destruction. Retrieved March 18, 2024.
